attributes.action: include the Union Jack in any speeches made by the Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unlike most nations, when our Prime Minister gives a televised statement there is no sign of the British flag behind him. If PM Gordon Brown is going to declare that more British flags be flown across the UK then why does he not have one in his speeches. After all we need something else to look at besides his moody face.
